content.rendered: Broilers, Fryer and Roasters are used to make whole fryer.To make this you need garlic, sauce,butter, oil and a frying pan. First you need to mix the butter with the chicken on both sides.After that cook the chicken 15 minutes then turn the chicken and agai cook for 8-10 minutes or more longer until the juice of the chicken is clear.Once it’s done it is prepare to serve.Whole fryer Is a healthier if it frying in air fryer rather than oil fryer.

excerpt.rendered: Making a whole fryer you need a broiler, fryer or roasters based on how much meat you will need.We give these types of different type meat in a fresh and hygienic environment. So that its quality, quantity and taste can not change.
